articles.title: Majority of Covid patients have at least one symptom months later - Berkshire Live
articles.description: The most common symptom to persist is fatigue or muscle weakness
articles.content:
A new study has found that more than three quarters of Covid-19 patients have at least one ongoing symptom six months after initially becoming unwell.
